name: 張舜傑
objective:
1.簡介 
2.網路協定與架構
3.資料連接控制
4.線路交換技術
5.封包交換技術
6.區域網路技術
7.區域網路系統
8.網際網路協定
9.傳輸層協定
10. 網路安全
11.分散式應用
schedule:
1	Introduction of compute network 
2	Wireshark and Packet analysis
3	UDP Server and UDP Client
4	UDP application: Network calculator
5	Raw socket and packet sniffer
6	TCP Server and TCP Client
7	TCP application: Chat
8	TCP application: Telnet
9	Midterm Exam
10	TCP application: FTP Client
11	TCP application: FTP Server
12	TCP application: HTTPS
13	UDP application: Audio
14	VoIP application: SIP Invite session
15	VoIP application: Make Call
16	VoIP application: SIP Register session(MD5)
17	VoIP application: Make Call Via Server
18	Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Attendances (10%)
Practice (40%)
Midterm Exam (25%)
Final Exam (25%)
